data.eml:eml: Revision of Hindumanes Logunov, 2004 (Araneae: Salticidae: Lyssomaninae), with description of a new species from the Western Ghats of Kerala, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sudhin, Puthoor Pattammal, Nafin, Karunnappilli Shamsudheen, Sudhikumar, Ambalaparambil Vasu (2017): Revision of Hindumanes Logunov, 2004 (Araneae: Salticidae: Lyssomaninae), with description of a new species from the Western Ghats of Kerala, India. Zootaxa 4350 (2): 317-330, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4350.2.7
